Message: The user completes the submission of the form
What brand name should I set for the campaign to be approved?

When setting a brand name for your campaign, it's important to ensure that it aligns with NewsBreak's advertising policies and guidelines. Make sure the brand name is accurate, not misleading, and does not violate any trademark or copyright laws. If you're unsure about specific requirements, I recommend reviewing the advertising policy document for detailed guidelines. You can find more information here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). Let me know if you have any other questions!
How to get camp approved quickly

To get your campaign approved quickly, make sure to follow these steps:
1. **Adhere to Policies**: Ensure your ad content complies with NewsBreak's advertising policies and guidelines. This includes avoiding prohibited content and ensuring all claims are truthful.
2. **Clear Branding**: Use clear and legible branding that does not infringe on trademarks or copyrights.
3. **Accurate Information**: Provide accurate information about the product or service you are promoting.
4. **Review Before Submission**: Double-check your ad for any errors or policy violations before submitting it for approval.
For more detailed information, you can refer to the [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any specific questions, feel free to ask!
